title: Who is Taylor Swift's guitarist on tour? - Quora

response.answer_text: PAUL SIDOTI – GUITAR AND BACKUP SINGER Paul Sidoti plays guitar and sings background vocals for Taylor Swift. He was born on May 19, 1971 in Cleveland, Ohio. He started playing guitar at the age of five. He eventually taught himself to play keyboard, bass and drums, and took saxophone lessons through middle school and high school. Paul started his own rock band at 14-years-old, where he sang and played guitar. When he auditioned for Taylor, he only had one homemade guitar with him.  He has toured with her since 2007
